# Quality Assurance Fixes (2026-01-22)

**Problem**: Multiple TypeScript errors in test files and missing import in OutputRenderer.tsx

**Solution**: Fixed DataframeRenderer import and systematically fixed test file issues

**Files**:
- web/src/components/node/OutputRenderer.tsx (added DataframeRenderer import)
- web/src/hooks/__tests__/useApiKeyValidation.test.ts (added secrets and isSuccess to mocks)
- web/src/hooks/__tests__/useJobReconnection.test.tsx (fixed null/undefined type issues)
- web/src/hooks/__tests__/useProviders.test.tsx (fixed imports and require() issues)
- web/src/hooks/__tests__/useRunningJobs.test.tsx (fixed job properties)
- web/src/hooks/__tests__/useAutosave.test.tsx (added QueryClientProvider wrapper)
- web/src/utils/__tests__/highlightText.test.ts (fixed type definitions)

**Impact**: 
- Reduced TypeScript errors from 60+ to ~35
- Lint now passes with only warnings (0 errors)
- Test pass rate: 99.8% (3153/3158 passing)
